description: Suzuki Monami is http://anidb.net/ch11312 [Capeta]`s Childhood friend. She is very aggressive and forceful but kind and caring. Monami is the biggest supporter of Capeta`s team. She calls herself http://anidb.net/ch18523 [Team Capeta]`s coach. Later, she becomes a singer to bring more happiness other than to Capeta and http://anidb.net/ch11314 [Nobu] but still supports them.
name: Suzuki Monami
